1.0.name: wordpress/any-user-twitter-feed
1.0.description:
Free Wordpress Twitter Widget. Embed anyone's Twitter Timeline using only their username, or display tweets based on a keyword. Fully compatible with the latest Twitter API and guaranteed to work even with the forthcoming Twitter changes!

Features:

  1. Embed timelines using only username
  2. Show tweets which contain a keyword
  3. Highly configurable, many visual options
  4. Using Twitter 1.1 API with authentication
  5. No JavaScript
